job.title: REMOTE Data Scientist (copy)
job.description: We are 400 employees from diverse backgrounds that hail from more than 50 countries and speak 15 languages But we all share one thing in common were passionate about accelerating software innovation Our vision is to put Nexus products at the center of every opensource decision made by modern engineering organizationsbrbrWe support our remote employee experience While we have great office spaces in the Fulton MD Tysons Corner VA London UK and Sydney AUS were very distributed and remote first and always have been We use several communication tools to connect across the companyand all remote employees have the opportunity to visit our offices and meet their teams facetoface at team meetups We also have an annual company meetup to get quality inperson time with the entire company at least once a yearbrbrLearn more at wwwsonatypecom brbrWe are looking for team members who want to help us change how the world innovates through software The Sonatype team has already done this through its contributions to the Maven build system the Nexus Repository Manager and most recently with the Nexus Lifecycle product suite  literally changing the way the world creates and delivers software across thousands of organizations and millions of developers That was just the beginning We need your help so that we can do it again If you are interested in delivering value across nearly every decision made in the world of software development to help companies create better and safer software faster to transform innovation through software read onbrbrstronguWho You Are And What Youll DobrustrongulliYou are an experienced data scientist ready to define and solve questions at the edge of our existing business model and to help us further innovate in our work for the enterprise and opensource communitiesliliYou will work collaboratively with data engineers and data analysts on the RNA team to build shortterm prototypes and proof of concepts for our longterm vision liliYou are business intelligenceoriented and are interested in customer statistics product popularity segmentation etc liliYou will build MLAI models to prove or disprove hypotheses quickly liliYou will work with large data sets to provide insight into timely businesscritical questions liliYou will be a storyteller for data science helping the team and users on the journey to understanding our databrliulstronguWhat Skills Youll NeedbrustrongulliYou have a BS MS or PhD in Data Science Computer Science Statistics or equivalent experienceliliYou have 3 years of work experience in data science or a related fieldliliYou have experience working with data lakes and data warehouses and working in a notebook environment eg Databricks Jupyter NotebookliliYou have experience with at least one commonly used data science programming language eg Python Scala SQLliliYou have experience with multiple machine learning packages platforms and tools eg pandas scikit numpy SparkliliYou have experience working with data visualization tools eg d3 plotlyliliAlso we know its tough but please try to avoid the confidence gap  You dont have to match all the listed requirements exactly to be considered for this rolebrliulstronguThings Were Proud OfbrustrongulliFast Company Top 50 Companies for Innovators 2018 2019 and 2020lili2019 Best Places to Work Washington Post and Washingtonianlili2019 Wealthfront Top Career Launch CompanyliliEY Entrepreneur of the Year 2019liliDiversity amp Inclusion Working GroupsliliParental Leave PolicyliliPaid Volunteer Time Off VTOliliSee why weve won the awards and enjoy a 46 Glassdoor ratingbrliulAt Sonatype we value diversity and inclusivity We offer perks such as parental leave diversity and inclusion working groups and flexible working practices to allow our employees to show up as their whole selves We are an equal opportunity employer and we do not discriminate on the basis of race religion color national origin gender sexual orientation age marital status veteran status or disability status If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation please do not hesitate to let us knowbrbr
